price: Enti Yεgyee no ne wͻn a wͻka ne ho no nkwa wͻ nsuom hyεn a ayε mma no mu.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu waman maʿahu fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
